means: 神经紧张的，忧虑的，烦恼的

sentence.Network_en: She was in a very overwrought state after the accident.
sentence.Network_cn: 事故发生后她精神十分紧张.

sentence.Network_en: One overwrought member had to be restrained by friends.
sentence.Network_cn: 一位成员过于激动，朋友们不得不进行拦阻。

sentence.Network_en: Scarlett found that it relieved her overwrought nerves.
sentence.Network_cn: 思嘉发现这样可以使她过分紧张的神经放松一些.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Making Choices_在线英语听力室 ... ) syndrome 综合病症 ) overwrought 过度紧张的，过劳的 ) malaise 不舒服.
overwrok 过度工作overwrought 过度劳累的overzealous 过分热心的
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... overwhelm 泛滥；压倒 overwrought 紧张过度的 owl 猫头鹰.
Making Choices_在线英语听力室 ... ) syndrome 综合病症 ) overwrought 过度紧张的，过劳的 ) malaise 不舒服.

list.abs: ve learned that markets , which are often just mad crowds , are often irrational ; when emotionally overwrought , they ; re almost always wrong .我已经知道了，疯狂的大众有时候就是市场，市场常常是非理性的，只要他们情绪不安，他们几乎总是错的。
When you ' re emotionally overwrought , it can be hard to remember exactly what was said., 在情绪过度劳累时 , 要准确地记住说过的话往往会很难.
As it happens Chronicle report was a little overwrought ., 正如所发生的那样 , < 旧金山时报 > 的报道有点言过其实.
Marburger also helped to defuse the overwrought atmosphere by quelling talk about the a " Manhattan Project " against terrorism .对于以「曼哈坦计画」反恐的激进主张，马伯格协助抚平，纾解了紧张气氛。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: archaic past participle of overwork

entry.tran: 极不高兴的；过于激动的
entry.def: Someone who is overwrought is very upset and is behaving in an uncontrolled way.

example.ex: One overwrought member had to be restrained by friends.
example.tran: 一位成员过于激动，朋友们不得不进行拦阻。

auth_sentence.content: I'm feeling overwrought, tired of London.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm feeling overwrought, tired of London.

auth_sentence.content: If...you are overwrought, stressed or worried.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If...you are overwrought, stressed or worried.

auth_sentence.content: There is not a sentence of strained emphasis or overwrought antithesis.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is not a sentence of strained emphasis or overwrought antithesis.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is not a sentence of strained emphasis or overwrought antithesis.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"翻转"; 2. 表示"在……之上"; 3. 表示"过度,过分,超过"

stems_affixes.word_buile: over过度,过分,超过+all全部→adj.全部的, 全面的
over过度,过分,超过+correct改正→adj.矫枉过正的
over过度,过分,超过+crowded拥挤的→adj.挤满的
over超过+sea海+s复数→adv.海外 adj.外国的, 海外的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 紧张过度的,兴奋过度的
stems_affixes.word_buile: over过度,过分,超过+wrought=work工作→过度工作
over翻转+night夜, 夜晚→翻过一夜→一夜间→一下子;突然
over超过+sea海+s复数→adv.海外 adj.外国的, 海外的
over翻转+haul拉→拉过去检修
over翻转+throw扔→扔翻了→推翻
over翻转+turn转→翻转
over在……之上+bridge桥→上面的桥→天桥
over在……之上+coat衣服→在衣服上的衣服→外套
over过度,过分,超过+dose剂量→n.药物过量
over过度,过分,超过+production生产→n.生产过度
over过度,过分,超过+study学习→n.用功过度
over过度,过分,超过+work工作→n.过度劳累
over在……之上+lap交叉→[大腿]交叉→重叠
over过度,过分,超过+flow流动→流出来了,溢出
over翻转+take拿,占领→v.袭击,压倒
over在……之上+come来→来到上面→战胜
over在……之上+hang悬挂→v.悬于……之上, 悬垂
over在……之上+look看→在上面看→俯视,引申为疏忽
over在……之上+ride骑→骑在上面→推翻[下面的]
over在……之上+whelm推翻;淹没→翻过来→压倒
over过度,过分,超过+act演出→v.表演过火

means.word_mean: 神经紧张的;忧虑的,烦恼的

sentences.en: She was in a very overwrought state after the accident.
sentences.cn: 事故发生后她精神十分紧张。
